Title: Do your job well, cherish world revolution -- study the revolutionary modern Beijing opera "On the docks"
Publisher: Shandong renmin chubanshe (山东人民出版社)
Notes: The characters on the sacks of grain read "Prepare for struggle, prepare for famine, for the people" (Bei zhan, bei huang, wei renmin 备战、 备荒、 为人民), a slogan proposed by Mao Zedong in 1965. In the background is Fang Haizhen (方海珍), heroine of the model opera On the Docks (Haigang, 海港).
